assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Margaret Gleeson and Maira Kentwell declare remunerated consultant roles with the company AstraZeneca with respect to activities unrelated to this article. Paula Woodward had a remunerated consultant role with respect to the current study. The other authors declare that they have no conflicts of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was approved by the University of New South Wales (UNSW) Human Research Ethics Advisory Panel (Biomedical), approval number 180586.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was sought from all research participants.

assertion.value: This content has been made available to all.
